member.summary: Converts the date and time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)

member.name: T:VTQT.Services.Seo.SeoDefaults
member.summary: Represents default values related to SEO services

member.name: P:VTQT.Services.Seo.SeoDefaults.ForumTopicLength
member.summary: Gets a max length of forum topic slug name
member.remarks: For long URLs we can get the following error: "the specified path, file name, or both are too long. The fully qualified file name must be less than 260 characters, and the directory name must be less than 248 characters", that's why we limit it to 100

member.name: P:VTQT.Services.Seo.SeoDefaults.SearchEngineNameLength
member.summary: Gets a max length of search engine name
member.remarks: For long URLs we can get the following error: "the specified path, file name, or both are too long. The fully qualified file name must be less than 260 characters, and the directory name must be less than 248 characters", that's why we limit it to 200

member.name: P:VTQT.Services.Seo.SeoDefaults.ReservedUrlRecordSlugs
member.summary: Gets a default list of slugs (sename) reserved for some other needs

member.name: P:VTQT.Services.Seo.SeoDefaults.SitemapDateFormat
member.summary: Gets a date and time format for the sitemap

member.name: P:VTQT.Services.Seo.SeoDefaults.SitemapMaxUrlNumber
member.summary: Gets a max number of URLs in the sitemap file. At now each provided sitemap file must have no more than 50000 URLs

member.name: M:VTQT.Services.Seo.UrlRecordService.InitializeSeoCharacterTable
member.summary:
Stores Unicode characters and their "normalized" values to a hash table. Character codes are referenced by hex numbers because that's the most common way to refer to them.
Upper-case comments are identifiers from the Unicode database. Lower- and mixed-case comments are the author's

member.name: M:VTQT.Services.Seo.UrlRecordService.ToUnichar(System.String)
member.summary: Takes a hexadecimal string and converts it to an Unicode character
member.param: A four-digit number in hex notation (eg, 00E7).
member.returns: A unicode character, as string.

member.name: M:VTQT.Services.Seo.UrlRecordService.GetAllUrlRecordsAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: Language ID; "null" to load records with any language; "0" to load records with standard language only; otherwise to load records with specify language ID only
A value indicating whether to get active records; "null" to load all records; "false" to load only inactive records; "true" to load only active records
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation The task result contains the uRL records

member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation The task result contains the found slug

member.name: M:VTQT.Services.Seo.UrlRecordService.GetSeNameAsync``1(``0,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: Language identifier; pass null to use the current language
A value indicating whether to return default value (if language specified one is not found)
A value indicating whether to ensure that we have at least two published languages; otherwise, load only default value
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation The task result contains the search engine name (slug)

member.name: M:VTQT.Services.Seo.UrlRecordService.GetSeNameAsync(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: A value indicating whether non western chars should be converted
A value indicating whether Unicode chars are allowed
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation The task result contains the result

Ensure that sename is not empty
